name: Voyage To Atlantis Mini Game
description: Voyage to Atlantis is a vertical shooter game. In Voyage to Atlantis, you are controlling a submarine that tries to reach Atlantis. On the journey to the Atlantis, your submarine will be encounter lots of aggressive fishes. Hope you can survive. This will be my first game. I am currently working on the stages and bosses. This version only includes an endless game mode. Hope you like it.
